twitch.chat.authorize.message: XSplitに対してTwitchの使用を許可します。

twitch.chat.switch_account.message: **%api%** アカウントを切り替える

twitch.chat.error_channel_not_found.message: 有効のチャンネルを入力してください。

twitch.chat.hide_user_name.message: ユーザー名を非表示にする

twitch.chat.hide_timestamp.message: タイムスタンプを隠す

twitch.chat.hide_user_icons.message: ユーザーアイコンを隠す

twitch.chat.hide_on_idle.message: 無反応時にチャットを隠す

twitch.chat.animation_override_settings.message: 表示設定を手動で上書きします。

twitch.chat.animation_set_duration.message: This will set the time duration of the scrolling animation.

twitch.chat.animation_scroll_text.message: This will dynamically scroll user chat messages across the screen.[br][br]The best way to display this plugin is to adjust your source to full size view.

twitch.chat.block_help.message: You can block viewers by adding their name or username (including bots, if applicable) in the blocked list so that their messages will not appear in the chat viewer.[br][br]This blocked list is not connected to your channel's blocked list. It only works for this chat source.

twitch.chat.blocking_name.message: Enter the name or username of the viewer you wish to block.
